noun.description: The practice of excluding or not admitting other things.
examples: these banks maintain their exclusivity by setting minimum entry standards
the event was criticized for its exclusivity

noun.description: Restriction to a particular person, group, or area.
examples: those inside the circle cultivate an air of exclusivity
we have exclusivity agreements with companies

noun.description: The state of catering for or being affordable by only a few, select customers.
examples: the hotel's emphasis is on exclusivity and luxury
